Uses of Package
peregrine.worker

Packages that use peregrine.worker
peregrine.worker Worker daemon including PFS (partitioned filesystem) support as well as main daemon interface (RPC, etc). 
peregrine.worker.clientd Client handlers and other associated infrastructure for performing bigtable-esque GET, SCAN, and PUT operations. 
peregrine.worker.rpcd   
peregrine.worker.rpcd.delegate   
 

Classes in peregrine.worker used by peregrine.worker
ErrorLoggingChannelUpstreamHandler
           
FSPutBaseHandler
          Base handler for dealing with logging throughput and other issues with PUT.
HeartbeatTimer
          The HeartbeatTimer sends heartbeat messages to the controller regularly so that we know that this worker is still alive.
StorageBroadcastTimer
          Broadcast storage metadata to the controller.
WorkerDaemon
          Main daemon for handling filesystem operations.
WorkerHandler
          Handles all HTTP requests sent to a worker.

ErrorLoggingChannelUpstreamHandler

          Main daemon for handling filesystem operations.

          Handles all HTTP requests sent to a worker.
